definitions.text: the rear part of a ship
United States concert violinist (born in Russia in 1920)
the fleshy part of the human body that you sit on
examples: he deserves a good kick in the butt
are you going to sit on your fanny and do nothing?

definitions.text: of a stern or strict bearing or demeanor; forbidding in aspect
not to be placated or appeased or moved by entreaty
examples: Russia's final hour, it seemed, approached with inexorable certainty

definitions.text: severe and unremitting in making demands
